data.eml:eml: A remarkable new Awas Loebl from southern China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yin, Zi-Wei, Shen, Jia-Wei, Li, Li-Zhen (2015): A remarkable new Awas Loebl from southern China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae). ZooKeys 522: 153-158, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.522.6109, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.522.6109
